about_the_game:
In Repit 2 you will find even more non-linear and immersive gaming experience. Forget about standard and predictable levels, in Repit 2 every level will be full of surprises and unexpected twists. Help the main character Bob get out, overcoming one test after another, from the terrible place where the old man imprisoned him

In addition, you are waiting for:

  • Non distracting graphics
  • Pleasant music
  • Square hero
  • Long jumps
  • Short jumps
  • Pie
